page.title: 20EDUCATION CREDENHILLBURGHILL
page.content: In our D block there ase two primary schools and three play groups. One school is in Credenhill and the other at Burghill. There are two play groups in Credenhill and one in Burghill.190 children attend Credenhill school and 36 at Burghill.There are eight teachers at Credenhill and two at Burghill. The children from Credenhill go to secondary school at Weobley and those from Burghill go to Whitecross school in Hereford. At Burghill school we do the S.M.P. maths scheme which involves practical work in measuring,weighing etc. We use the Ginn Reading 360 scheme which is brightly illustrated and has interesting reading material. We do project work, history, geography, science, music and art. During March 1985 we made a long weekend visit to York.
